original_title: New American Bible: New & Old Testaments
overview: Experience the New American Bible -- both Old and New Testaments -- in this program combining more than 74 hours of narration with on-screen graphics and text. The Scriptures come vividly to life as Emmy Award winner Stephen Johnston narrates with his pleasing baritone. An option allows the viewer to select a single chapter or book or to continuously play. Bonus material includes a Holy Land photo tour.
title: New American Bible: New & Old Testaments
